Name: Verify Successful Navigation to Shop Page
Description: Navigate to the Katalon True Test page and click on the 'Shop Now' button. Verify that the Katalon True Test page is displayed.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://davidacero.github.io/katalonTrueTest
step 2: Click on button 'Shop Now'
step 3: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Successful Addition of Item to Cart
Description: Navigate to the Katalon True Test page and add an item to the cart. Verify that the Katalon True Test page is displayed.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://davidacero.github.io/katalonTrueTest
step 2: Click on button 'Add to cart'
step 3: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
